item.title: An automatic interactive pre-commit checklist, in the style of infomercials
item.author: hello@vickylai.com (Vicky Lai)
item.description: What’s that, you say? You’ve become tired of regular old boring paper checklists? Well, my friend, today is your lucky day! You, yes, you, can become the proud owner of a brand-spanking-new automatic interactive pre-commit hook checklist! You’re gonna love this! Your life will be so much easier! Just wait until your friends see you. What’s a pre-commit hook? Did you know that nearly 1 out of 5 coders are too embarrassed to ask this question?
